answers.answer: Yu must watch what yu eat.. i have diabetes nd its hard to control them at first but once yu get the hang of it its a piece of cake.. im carrying twins so its even harder.. they want me to write my blood sugars down nd what i eat..it will help yu if yur sugars are high so yu kno what not to eat.. good luck to yu..

question: My doctor wants me to monitor my blood sugar and see a nutritionist...what else are you ladies doing that have been diagnosed with gestational diabetes? Any suggestions on how to control it?
title: diagnosed with gestational diabetes
